channel.title: No-ip without a router? meh. - BIG REWARD!
channel.description: Alright 200k RS cash, if you can help me set-up a No-ip server. I'm not kidding. :P Send me a PM, I know how to set-up Hamachi... I don't care about Hamachi people only play on No-ip Servers, anyone help please? I need help setting up a server without a router.

item.title: No-ip without a router? meh. - BIG REWARD!
item.dc:creator: @adam2348 adam2348
item.description:
@adam2348 wrote:

goto http://www.no-ip.com/

sign up and log in, then click Redirect/host, then type residetscape, then put ip address in that it says is ur ip. then save and have someone try it out. make sure u don’t have windows firewall on too. anytime ur ip address changes, u have to update it.

Read full topic
item.source: No-ip without a router? meh. - BIG REWARD!
